column4: Hi! I'm using Ubuntu 9.10. Often when I have many windows open, I can't switch to them via the panel, only by alt-tab. They don't respond on mouse clicks. What's wrong?
Don't think so, I've disabled all visual effects under appearance
Have you checked launchpad to see if anyone else is having that issue?
Does it happen when some specific app is started?
Oh well ... there's some other peculiarities that have occured lately, so I'll just do a fresh install when 10 comes
Yeah, like the indicator applet suddenly losing the option to shutdown etc
No, but that indicator problem is not unique, seen others get it too with 9.10
I completely skipped 9.10 cause of all the bugs I had with several machines. Dont feel bad.
I use gnome-terminal. It has none of the requested functions.
Right have you browsed through software center and tried a few others?
I've tried three, and googled around, but googling for "terminal linux sound charset" etc isn't specific enough
